name: PfCombat
description: This script tracks and manages damage to creatures, providing both visual feedback on tokens and output to the chat windows. It tracks both lethal and non-lethal damage. It handles creatures that don't suffer nonlethal damage, and automatically calculates stabilising at negative hitpoints.

useroptions.name: chat
useroptions.description: By default, changes to a token's status are output to the chat window for all to see.
